text: Craig Theodore Nelson (born April 4, 1944) is an American actor, who is known for his roles as Hayden Fox in Coach and as Mr. Incredible in The Incredibles. He has won an Emmy Award. ==Life== Nelson was born on April 4, 1944 in Spokane, Washington.Craig T. Nelson Biography (1944-) He studied at the University of Arizona and at Central Washington University. He was married to Robin Nelson until they divorced in 1978.
